LanguageData.RK_Scenario_Rebel.label: Ratkin Rebel Sympathizers
LanguageData.RK_Scenario_Rebel.description: Some Ratkins, angered by the contradictions of the king's rule, the caste system, and the pre-modern social system, decided to join the rebels who sought to overthrow the monarchy and establish a republic. The rebels armed these Ratkins and welcomed them into the revolution. Ratkins who want to help the rebels establish the Republic of Rakinia
